data.lyric:
[ti:Love You Too Late]
[ar:Cole Swindell]
[al:Love You Too Late]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love You Too Late - Cole Swindell
[00:05.09]Lyricist：Michael Carter/Cole Swindell/Brandon Kinney
[00:10.18]I wish this whisky
[00:12.27]Would make her miss me
[00:13.80]Like I wish she did I wish she did
[00:18.46]Pouring up another one
[00:20.75]Won't change what I should've done
[00:22.66]Before she left now all that's left is
[00:27.34]Mile by mile and city by city she's
[00:31.56]Getting over me and man it ain't pretty no
[00:35.80]She's out there rolling down some old interstate
[00:40.01]Wide open wide open couldn't make her stay
[00:44.30]Probably cranking up some new freedom song
[00:48.54]Wide open wide open won't pick up the phone
[00:52.27]While I'm dying here tonight
[00:54.61]Staring goodbye in the face
[00:58.62]Saying I love you too late
[01:01.30]
[01:04.51]Too late
[01:05.72]
[01:09.12]I can't take back what
[01:11.41]I never say would
[01:13.58]If I could man I would
[01:17.21]
[01:17.89]Try and make her see
[01:19.89]That me and Tennessee want her back
[01:23.23]I wish it worked like that yeah
[01:26.23]If I had half a clue where she was heading now
[01:30.35]I'd do what I had to do to make her
[01:32.82]Turn her car around
[01:34.69]She's out there rolling down some old interstate
[01:38.88]Wide open wide open couldn't make her stay
[01:43.17]Probably cranking up some new freedom song
[01:47.38]Wide open wide open won't pick up the phone
[01:51.11]While I'm dying here tonight
[01:53.62]Staring goodbye in the face
[01:57.54]Saying I love you too late
[02:00.41]
[02:03.23]Too late
[02:05.04]
[02:16.55]Yeah I shoulda held her close
[02:18.87]I shoulda let her know
[02:20.88]How I felt about her
[02:22.14]'Bout a couple county lines ago
[02:25.21]She's out there rolling down some old interstate
[02:29.74]Wide open wide open I couldn't make her stay
[02:33.62]Probably cranking up some new freedom song
[02:37.86]Wide open wide open won't pick up the phone
[02:42.03]While I'm dying here tonight
[02:44.20]Staring goodbye in the face
[02:47.55]
[02:48.10]Saying I love you too late
[02:50.67]
[02:53.94]Too late yeah
[02:57.73]
[03:01.77]I love you too late
[03:04.38]
[03:07.01]I can't take back what
[03:09.48]I never said but
[03:11.51]If I could d**n I would
data.trans:
[ti:Love You Too Late]
[ar:Cole Swindell]
[al:Love You Too Late]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.09]//
[00:10.18]我希望喝点威士忌
[00:12.27]能让她想念我
[00:13.80]我希望她曾想念过我
[00:18.46]喝再多的酒
[00:20.75]也弥补不了我犯下的错
[00:22.66]她已经离去 我已一无所有
[00:27.34]她离我越来越远
[00:31.56]她快要忘了我 朋友 这种事情一点都不美好
[00:35.80]她行驶在某一条州际公路上
[00:40.01]一去不回 我没能留住她
[00:44.30]她可能已经开始新的精彩生活
[00:48.54]一去不回 她不接电话
[00:52.27]我已经痛不欲生
[00:54.61]你走得毅然决然
[00:58.62]现在说我爱你已经太迟了
[01:01.30]
[01:04.51]太迟了
[01:05.72]
[01:09.12]我非常后悔
[01:11.41]有些话没有说出来
[01:13.58]但是如果一切重来 我一定会
[01:17.21]
[01:17.89]让她明白
[01:19.89]我想要她回来 田纳西永远欢迎她
[01:23.23]我希望这样行得通
[01:26.23]如果我知道她去了哪里就好了
[01:30.35]我会拼尽全力让她
[01:32.82]回心转意
[01:34.69]她在某一条州际公路上行驶
[01:38.88]一去不回 我没能留住她
[01:43.17]她可能已经开始新的精彩生活
[01:47.38]一去不回 她不接电话
[01:51.11]我已经痛不欲生
[01:53.62]你走得毅然决然
[01:57.54]现在说我爱你已经太迟了
[02:00.41]
[02:03.23]太迟了
[02:05.04]
[02:16.55]当初我应该紧紧抱住她
[02:18.87]我应该告诉她
[02:20.88]我对她的感情有多深
[02:22.14]早就应该告诉她了
[02:25.21]她在某一条州际公路上行驶
[02:29.74]一去不回 我没能留住她
[02:33.62]她可能已经开始新的精彩生活
[02:37.86]一去不回 她不接电话
[02:42.03]我已经痛不欲生
[02:44.20]你走得毅然决然
[02:47.55]
[02:48.10]现在说我爱你已经太迟了
[02:50.67]
[02:53.94]太迟了
[02:57.73]
[03:01.77]我爱你爱得太晚了
[03:04.38]
[03:07.01]我非常后悔
[03:09.48]有些话没有说出来
[03:11.51]但是如果一切重来 我一定会对你说出来
